text:
I was in a very similar position, with no internal mentor at all at my last job and good mentors at my new one but with none focused on content. 

The two resources that helped me the most in bridging the gap you're talking about were Superpath Pro and <@UJ2MQ8SRH>’s Some Good Content on Patreon.

I also recently put together a list for a friend getting started in content. It has all the resources and specific articles that have helped me the most so far. I'd be happy to share it with you (or anyone else) just send me a DM. :blush:

Finally, cannot overstate the value of reaching out to content marketers you respect, telling them you respect them, and asking for some time to chat. I have a whole list of people I'm hoping to reach out to, to discuss different areas of content marketing based on their specialties. I reached out to four people this week alone and booked 4/4 calls for January.
